Am I the only one who gets Kerbin stripped of oceans after reverting flight?

For GNU/Linux users who are experiencing dark artifacts on the ocean, It may be worth trying to disable edge highlighting(PPFX) and thermal highlights on the graphics setting then restart your game. It fixed mine. No guarantees though.

Update: It's only fixed when you start a game, then after a scene change it goes back to dark again.

Update2: If you revert to Space Center. The ocean looks fine.
